Package com.kontakt.sdk.ble.manager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionManager.ActionNotifier Deprecated
    ManagerConfiguration
    The Manager configuration holds resources required by backing service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBeaconService<Configuration extends Closeable>
    AbstractBeaconService provides abstraction for backing services working with BeaconManager.
    AbstractBeaconService.MessagingHandler
    The type Messaging handler.
    ActionController Deprecated
    ActionManager Deprecated
    ActionManager.Configuration Deprecated
    ActionManager.Configuration.Builder
    Configuration builder is responsible for creating immutable configuration which acts as a parameters and callbacks supplier and thus describes desired behaviour.
    ActionService Deprecated
    BeaconManager
    Beacon Manager collaborates with Beacon Service (BeaconService) and delegates actions to it.
    BeaconManager.Configuration
    Each of the managers has its own configuration which is built and delivered to collaborating Service.
    BeaconManager.Configuration.Builder
    Configuration builder is responsible for creating immutable configuration which acts as a parameters and callbacks supplier and thus describes desired behaviour.
    BeaconManager.MonitoringListener
    Monitoring listener provides callbacks for monitoring process performed by Beacon Manager (BeaconManager).
    BeaconManager.RangingListener
    Ranging listener provides callback method indicating found Beacon within previously specified Region (Region).
    BeaconService
    BeaconService collaborates with BeaconManager.
    BeaconServiceL
    BeaconServiceL is a backing service for BeaconManager that connects to and collaborates with it from OS Version Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BeaconManager.Profile
